mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description1: At Team Sync, we're on a mission to transform how teams collaborate, communicate, and complete projects. We believe that when teams work in harmony, they achieve extraordinary results.
mission.description2: Our platform is designed to eliminate the friction in project management, creating a seamless experience that empowers teams to focus on what matters most: creating value and delivering excellence.

story.title: Our Story
story.description1: Team Sync was born in the learning halls of Multimedia University, Melaka. What started as a student project quickly evolved into something much bigger when we realized the universal challenges teams face in project management.
story.description2: Founded by a group of passionate students with diverse expertise in software development, design, and business, Team Sync has grown from a simple task management tool into a comprehensive project management ecosystem that serves teams of all sizes across various industries.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly push boundaries to create tools that make work more intuitive and efficient.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We believe in the power of teamwork and design our platform to enhance how people work together.

simplicity.title: Simplicity
simplicity.description: We strive to make complex processes simple, focusing on user experience and intuitive design.

reliability.title: Reliability
reliability.description: We build systems you can count on, with security and stability as top priorities.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Meet the passionate individuals behind Team Sync who are dedicated to making project management more efficient, collaborative, and enjoyable.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: Have questions about Team Sync? We'd love to hear from you!

location.title: Our Location
location.address: Siti Hasmah Digital Library, Learning Point

suggestedSearches.designProject: Create a website redesign project with UI/UX design, frontend development, and testing tasks

pengy.error: Pengy slipped on the ice. Let's try again!
pengy.tipDetails: For best results, include details like due dates, priorities, and task descriptions. For example: "Create a website development project with design, development, and testing tasks"
pengy.tipDetailsForProject: You can say "Add 5 high priority tasks: homepage design, user login feature, database design..." or "Invite team@example.com to join the team"

TermsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
TermsAndConditions.introduction: These Terms and Conditions ("Terms", "Agreement") govern your access to and use of the Team Sync web application ("Service", "App"), operated by Team Sync ("we", "our", or "us"). By creating an account or using any part of the Service, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
TermsAndConditions.disagreement: If you do not agree to these Terms, do not use the Service.

features.calendar: Calendar – Uses a calendar view to plan, schedule, and track tasks by date.
features.posts: Posts – Publish and manage project-related announcements.
features.files: Files – Upload, organize, and share documents.
features.timeline: Timeline – Visualize tasks along a simple project timeline.
features.note: Note – Central knowledge-base for notes and documentation.
features.kanban: Kanban – Status-based board for task tracking.
features.workflow: Workflow – Map tasks through structured progress stages.
features.agile: Agile – Board tailored for iterative agile cycles.
features.gantt: Gantt – Full gantt chart with timelines and dependencies.
